name: 90s Loose Jeans
description: Our roomy, chilled-to-the-max throwback. It's a relaxed straight jean with an effortless slouch. Call it a vibe. We'll call it an essential. Fit: Relaxed through the hip & thigh with a loose, straight leg. Made with a longer inseam that stacks at your shoes. Fabric: 13 oz (369 g) rigid denim with 100% Regenerative Cotton. Stretch: No Stretch. Authentic rigid denim that gets better with every wear. Made to wear all day & break in over time. Look: A five-pocket distressed jean in a dark wash. Details: Button fly & five-pocket styling.

name: Oxford Shirt
description: A crisp classic that goes way beyond the 9-5. Smooth woven stretch cotton Oxford shirt. Button-down collar. Long sleeves with button cuffs. Button front. Patch pocket at chest. Assorted colors & prints.

name: Baggy Denim Shorts
description: The roomiest pair in your rotation. Extra loose, seriously cool & brings all the vibes. Fit: Extra roomy through the hip & thigh with a baggy, slightly tapered leg. Fabric: 100% Regenerative Cotton. Stretch: No Stretch. Authentic rigid denim that gets better with every wear. Made to wear all day & break in over time.â€‹ Look: Five-pocket denim shorts in a black wash. Details: Zip fly & five-pocket styling.

name: Relaxed Gap Logo Colorblock Hoodie
description: Soft, comfy fleece. Dropped shoulder, long sleeves with banded cuffs. Drawcord ties at hood. Gap logo at front. Kanga pocket. Banded hem. Allover colorblocking.

name: Original T-Shirt
description: Soft cotton T-shirt. Crewneck. Short sleeves.
